website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Caliber is a fairly good touch-screen feature phone for MetroPCS customers.
pros: The Samsung Caliber is slim and lightweight with a generous and attractive display
Features include an accelerometer, a 3.0-megapixel camera, a 3.5mm headset jack, a full HTML browser with Flash Lite, and a music player
It has good call quality as well
cons: The Samsung Caliber's touch screen can be a bit too sensitive at times, and it takes some acclimation

customer_reviews.title: Not very user-friendly
customer_reviews.text: Although the buttons are large on this remote It is not very useful for elderly people. My father has a hard time hitting the buttons just once. I tried it myself and found that it is not a easy remote to use I am in my mid-thirties and my dexterity is very good. I had a hard time hitting the buttons just once, I would not recommend buying this brand.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Helpful device for visual or manual difficulty
customer_reviews.text: This large button, easy to read remote has been a godsend for my elderly father. My only quibble is that while it has controls for tv, dvd, vcr, it does not have the necessary button to switch the input from tv to other, so we still need to use the other remote for that one function.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kara Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great for visualy impaired
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace the large # remote for my visually impaired mother, 94. The shape is easier for her to hold onto and the numbers are larger than on her old remote. She only uses the on/off and scroll and channel buttons. If she wants to watch a DVD, we have to be there because she can't find the right DVD so we help her with that. My son simply read the instructions and programmed it for her in 2-3 minutes. It works well for her.
customer_reviews.author: SGD

customer_reviews.title: Wasted time.
customer_reviews.text: I have a vizio tv. My tv was not listed on the manual for programming. I had to find the manual for programming online because it was not included in the box. Could not sync to dish tv. Wasted time..... .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: This was a good idea, but doesn't work. I bought this for my grandmother that cannot see well. I had a hard time programming the remote, so I thought I would call the customer service number to get some help however it was not a good number. It was not possible to get help so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Buttons hard to push
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have programmed it myself, but someone who knew what they were doing programmed it with minimal difficulty. I had read by a previous reviewer that the buttons were a little hard to push down, but I didn't realize this would create such a problem. I bought this for my dad, who has neuropathy in his hands, which also shake, but I thought he would have adequate muscle strength to push the buttons. Essentially, the remote works, and the large buttons are nice, but instead of enhancing his independence, he cannot push the buttons down hard enough to change a channel, so he just asks my mother to do it. Sort of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Husband said it was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mother who has macula degeneration. Husband said it was easy to set up. Mom says it is easy to use and she can see the back light numbers easliy
customer_reviews.author: John R Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Great remote for night time, hard to lose, great talking piece.
customer_reviews.text: I saw one of these at my brother in laws and thought, "pretty cool!" Aside from just being a universal remote, it really has proven to be user friendly between tv, VCR, DVD and the user's guide is straight forward and helpful if you just read it and go by it. It lights up really bright and is great for the bed, or arm rest of the couch or recliner. Solid made and good battery life. The only con I've found is that the buttons can be little hard to push depending on your position - but then again, in the long run this feature may prove to be the key to the products longevity too. Great product, Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Prudent purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - Does not work with Direct TV- Not Returnable
customer_reviews.text: When we could not program this remote, we called the manufacturer and discovered it was 14 years old and had apparently been sitting in a warehouse. We were told it would not work with a new satellite system. We ordered a newer upgraded model from Hy-Tek only to find that they did not have the proper code for Direct TV. Futhermore, Direct TVs codes would not work either. Direct TV will not contact Hy-Tek to resolve and vise versa. We are extremely disappointed and are out of the cost of this unit due to Amazons return policy being only 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bessette

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has fingers amputated and his other fingers are curled due to arthritis. I got this for him because I thought it would be easy for him to hold and the large buttons would be easier for him to push. It did everything I wanted it to do and more. You can set it to have the tv and cable box come on at the same time with the push on one button. It controls the tv volume and your dvd player. I would recommend this to anyone who has problems with their hands or eyesight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Annie

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this remote for in-laws. My father in law has macular degeneration so the large buttons seemed a good idea. The buttons on this remote are very hard to press and it is proving to be too difficult for them. I am on a search for a different remote. I am able to work the remote but the buttons do require more pressure than most to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea P

customer_reviews.title: Remote controll failure’
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to replace my old one . The recall button does not work either! Please respond ASAP with a answer to the problem.re
customer_reviews.author: Linda Tarlton Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Two units and does not work
customer_reviews.text: Programming would not stay for vcr/dvd. Would recall power and channel controlled. I contacted Hy Tek and they did send out another unit. Second unit performed the same as the first. This all took over 30 days and was pass the warranty so I can't get my money back. Anything with only 30 day return, should have buyer beware. As many 1's as 5's.
customer_reviews.author: H. Knoll

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to program however difficult for my 84 years old ...
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to program however difficult for my 84 years old mother to use. Instead of pressing one button for each different function you had to remember and press a group of buttons for each function. Not good for the elderly. Also when I returned it I had to pay shipping and a restock fee. Shop around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great remote for the seeing impaired.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my father in law who is partially blind. Works great, he can see the buttons and controll the TV and DVD player now without my assistance . Would have given enough it 5 stars if I could deactivate certain buttons (like the input button) so that he could not get himself in trouble by inadvertently changing the input source.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Smith

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to program for the TV
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use at a senior living facility. It was easy to program for the TV, Cable box, and DVD player. The large buttons let the residents see what they are doing without needing a magnifying glass. It is much better than the remote we had been using.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Ray

customer_reviews.title: big buttons
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my half blind mother-in-law and it works really well as she can now read the buttons much better.
customer_reviews.author: Russ T.

customer_reviews.title: Tcl verses your remote
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got a tcl 50” tv I still have to use my small remote to enlarge picture, I was told by Best Buy this would do all function, well it doesn’t, do you have a remote that will work with my tcl television with big numbers?
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: A bedroom must!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these for the last 15 years. Don't even need to put on the glasses to read these big glowing buttons in the dark. Buttons so big and well laid out you can use it with eyes closed.
customer_reviews.author: Dlewis

customer_reviews.title: Took a little time to learn- pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: Took a little time to learn- pretty good product. Helped my wife with ALS be able to change the channels
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not at all usefull
customer_reviews.text: The remote is big brash and well built but its no good if you cannot get the code for your TV, it took 2/12 weeks for a reply to my request for the code for our new TV and their answer is "we do not have the code for this TV" which is a common brand sold by a major retailer. Fairly blunt & to the point but it would have been nice to say we will do some digging and see if we can find a code for you. I have since replaced this remote with another big one which is a learning remote and will learn from your existing Remote so no drama's about codes.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Smith

customer_reviews.title: he is able to use it comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my pop who has very limited vision, and because of the size, he is able to use it comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: james nikides

customer_reviews.title: Hy-Tek Tek Partners Universal Remote Control
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has large lighted buttons. The channel up/down button on my original one stopped working after 5 years, all the other function keys continued to work so I purchased a new remote as I like to use the up/down channel button. Other than that it's a great product. I wish it was a bit lower priced.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bird

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with the Comcast X 1 cable box ...
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT work with the Comcast X 1 cable box. The Comcast box is RF and this remote is IR. I got a piece that is not gonna work for me.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: they love it and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to handicap person and it works very well,they love it and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: not so user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother. Set it up for her. But we have a great deal of trouble with the memory keeping what we programmed it to do. frustrating at times
customer_reviews.author: cp

customer_reviews.title: It's ok. I have Direct TV and it does ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I have Direct TV and it does not have any controls for the Recorded areas. Only does half of what my Direct remote does. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny M.

customer_reviews.title: Remote Control
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband because he is legally blind. I found it too difficult to program and you have to push too many buttons just to get to a channel. I don't doubt this is a good product, it just wasn't right for us. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Louise A. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 92 year old mom loves it.... she has to work hard to lose it. ☺
customer_reviews.author: Datadan

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: very cheaply made. Design and concept are great, it is a shame this is not a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Miller

customer_reviews.title: it is just ok
customer_reviews.text: This is just a regular remote that you would buy for less than 10 bucks at Walmart. The only advantage is the large buttons. When you push a button it reacts more slowly than the other remotes that I have.
customer_reviews.author: R. Blakeney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer support
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer support. When used with Dish Network, a code in the Dish controller must be changed to allow for multiple remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Dissatisfied purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great finger strength required to operate.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY for an elderly relative. These buttons are VERY difficult to push. My mother was not able to change the channel or adjust the volume. I'm returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Dgwdlvr

customer_reviews.title: Limited options
customer_reviews.text: Was limited in what other devices you could add was unable to connect to anything but the TV and nothing else cannot recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I gave it to someone as a gift. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to someone as a gift. I haven't heard any complaints. The person continues to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Great Remote!!!
customer_reviews.text: Your product was ordered for my aging parents and they love the remote. It fits very well and the large buttons are great. Thanks for the excellent product!!! Richard Rojas
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Rojas

customer_reviews.title: The company was easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it. Could not get it to work. The company was easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with choice...
customer_reviews.text: Good size for senior with reduced vision and arthritis. Buttons require solid pressure. Still cannot find code for DVD player after several minutes of scanning. Will keep trying! Button positioning user-friendly. Lighted key pad excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Little Seal

customer_reviews.title: they work great.
customer_reviews.text: I do not use them but I bought two for family members rhar have problems with eye sight, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dog Owner

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for use while exercising
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the older model in my home gym for years and appreciate the brightly lighted buttons and ease of use while jogging on a treadmill, When I upgraded to a Vizio TV, the old one was not compatible, as Vizios didn't exist when it was made. Customer service gave me a prompt reply to this effect, so I bought this model and use the old on in another room. The new one works fine in every respect. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Nelson MD

customer_reviews.title: Codes not available for my equipment
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted with the look and feel. But when I came to program there was no. Code for my Panasonic bluray / freeview player. I had no response from their web site when I aske if they had a code. Therefore item is not usable. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Rixon

customer_reviews.title: Remote
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my father-in-law. He enjoys it because of the large buttons. I would buy again at a later time
customer_reviews.author: Connie S. Painting

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It only does a very few functions. It can't control a dvd player properly. It can only turn it on and off, and hit the play button. Can't navigate through menus. It works fine as long as you don't want to actually do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Abrahamson

customer_reviews.title: New Zealand
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for Sky TV receiver in New Zealand.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Oversized Remote
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my parents & my dad had problems at first getting it to program. They have a sharp tv, but now it's working. My mom loves it.
customer_reviews.author: RubiTuesday

customer_reviews.title: Buttons too hard to push down.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but for my 84 year old Mom the buttons required too much physical pressure to activate. Not a device for weak hands.
customer_reviews.author: The Old Coach

customer_reviews.title: happy result
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my 94 year old mother -in law who is delighted with it and finds it easy to use and see as she has arthritis and is sight impaired the remote is ideal and was very easy to set up and has enhanced her quality of life and reduced the phone calls every night to none thank you. we are very pleased as always with service and speedy delivery
customer_reviews.author: seaside

customer_reviews.title: LARGE BUTTONS
customer_reviews.text: This is a great remote. The buttons are nice and large, very easy to use. The remote is also easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Queen

customer_reviews.title: Oversize Remote
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to program and worked ok except for the volume. The remote wouldn't turn the TV up to full volume. Since many elderly people are hard of hearing, this was a deal breaker. The buttons are a little hard to push. The master on/off was a nice feature; it turns all devices on and off simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: N. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Big isn't always better
customer_reviews.text: Have had remote 3 weeks and still can't get it to work like advertized. Have emailed company, with no response. Will probably send it back this week-end. The instruction manuel is very little help, website not much better. Buttons are large enough for elderly to see, but if it doesn't work ..........
customer_reviews.author: N. Cook

customer_reviews.title: universal remote control
customer_reviews.text: The first remote like this was purchased in April 2004 and that one gave up end of 2011. I found the same exact remote on Amazon. The big buttons are easier to use and the curve of the bottom helps it sit on the arm of my chair. I had no problem getting it set up to work with my TV
customer_reviews.author: SUV

customer_reviews.title: ... were given as gifts but they tell me they love it, so easy to see and read
customer_reviews.text: these were given as gifts but they tell me they love it, so easy to see and read. may have to order a couple for myself
customer_reviews.author: kathy green

customer_reviews.title: Great for seniors!
customer_reviews.text: My 92 year old father loves this! Easy to use, easy to hold, and large enough lettering so he can see the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: ANNE M SCHNEIDER

customer_reviews.title: I'll keep it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother who has trouble seeing. Come to find out she had lost her memory of numbers and couldn't use it. I liked it myself so instead of returning it I use it at night when I can't see.
customer_reviews.author: Georgewsusa

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: The buttons were a little hard to push. Also, when we had it set up, we realized that we couldn't change the channels and the volume both on the new remote. We found another one that cost a lot less and worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Moonspinner

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: My Mom has had one of these for at least 10 years and it worked perfectly until recently when liquid was spilled into it and left. With the large lighted buttons, strong construction and ease of use there was no question as to our replacing it with the same unit. The new one is super. I 100% recommend this remote.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Dave

customer_reviews.title: Just Like New
customer_reviews.text: This came in early, packaged well and in even better condition that expected. It's going to work out great for my elderly mom who sees very badly. It's big enough for her to see, the shape makes it easy to hold onto and she can see the buttons. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie J. Darling

customer_reviews.title: great for those with sight or finger strength problems
customer_reviews.text: Great ow cost solutinon for those with some disabilities.It doesn't work with higher end homr theater systems as well as some of the more expensive remotes but for basic TV DVD/VCR it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: purchased for a friend who is almost blind.
customer_reviews.text: purchased for a friend who is almost blind. he likes it and makes it easier for him to work the tv
customer_reviews.author: Shana Leisure

customer_reviews.title: Hy-Tek Universal Remote Control Review
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for dad to use, he is 92 years old and has several physical limits. The remote was very easy to setup for his TV and was very easy to show him how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Hinz

customer_reviews.title: Large Buttons
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father-in-law. It was a replacement for exactly like it that he had been using for over 12 years. He is 94 and the large buttons are very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: SallyT

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves it. She is legally blind but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Mom loves it. She is legally blind but it is large enough for her to handle and see.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible with Newer Convertor boxes or dvd players
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my aged parents. While it did manage to connect to the Television and turn it on and off, it was unable to connect to either the Samsung Cable box or the Go Video DVD/VCR box. When I called the manufacturer help line I was bluntly told that there was nothing I could do to make the remote function with either. In short, the term "Universal remote" is completely misleading. This remote is a rip-off.
customer_reviews.author: tlostlost

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Low-Vision
customer_reviews.text: Remotes for cable boxes and televisions are getting more complicated with the addition of new buttons to control new features. Unfortunitely the size of the remotes remain the same, making buttons smaller and harder to find for low-vision television watchers. This remote is the best remote I have found for a low-vision family member.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Returned this product
customer_reviews.text: Way too large!!!!!!!!!!! Somehow they need to design a controller that is larger than the normal control but not built for a giant. I had no idea it was this big when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: TERRY FISHER

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with dish network!!
customer_reviews.text: That is the main reason for the lack of stars. The controller works fine as long as you do not have a dish network reciever.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzooo

product_meta.title: Hy-Tek bw-0561-rd Partner BW0561RD Universal Remote Control
product_meta.description:
Controls TV, DVD, cable and satellite
Touch any button and they all light up
Easy to see
Too large to lose
Easy to program
feature_bullets: Home button for Smart TV functions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars111 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
